messages.title: £10billion extra for schools
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will reverse severe cuts by investing an extra £10billion in schools. We should be investing in our children's futures, not damaging them.

messages.title: More and more people across our communities are backing the Liberal Democrats.
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have an ambitious plan for the future of our country. We can build a future where we can grow our economy, tackle the climate emergency, and address the crises in our NHS and schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reverse severe cuts by investing an extra £10billion in schools, recruiting 20,000 more teachers nationwide and increasing funding for youth services.

issues.economy: We can build a future where we can grow our economy.
issues.education: Investing an extra £10billion in schools, recruiting 20,000 more teachers nationwide.
issues.health: Address the crises in our NHS.
